item.description:
It took some doing, but we got this one planned! We're heading to Johnny D's for Salsa for Justice.

Join us before the lesson starts at 9PM. As always, no worries if you don't dance. There's always a few SoJust folk hanging on the sidelines chatting it up. And we picked Johnny D's especially because they have a live band. So the music will be entertaining even if you don't want to twirl and twist.

The kitchen won't be open, so you're welcome to grab your fare down the street at Ana's or JP Licks and bring it in. Just no beverages...

Join us if you want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while hearing great salsa tunes, are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in, or have been looking for like-minded progressives to dance with in Boston. Be sure not to miss it if you are ready to build cross-issue coalitions - AND have fun!

Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions.
item.name: Salsa for Justice
